deviceUsageMIB.name: deviceUsageMIB
deviceUsageMIB.description: The USAGE-MIB is used to monitor resource usage of the device.

UsageStatus.name: UsageStatus
UsageStatus.description: Current status of the deviceUsagePercent. ok : value within limit. high : value surpassed high limit.

deviceUsageTable.name: deviceUsageTable
deviceUsageTable.description: This table lists the various attacks that are detected.

deviceUsageEntry.name: deviceUsageEntry
deviceUsageEntry.description: A deviceUsage entry describes the present usage of a resource.

deviceUsageIndex.name: deviceUsageIndex
deviceUsageIndex.description: An arbitrary value which uniquely identifies a resource.

deviceUsageTrapEnabled.name: deviceUsageTrapEnabled
deviceUsageTrapEnabled.description: This variable controls generation of deviceUsageTrap for this resource. When this variable is true(1), generation of deviceUsageTrap is enabled. When this variable is false(2), generation of deviceUsageTrap is disabled. The default start-up value is true(1).

deviceUsageName.name: deviceUsageName
deviceUsageName.description: The textual name of the resource i.e. Disk.

deviceUsagePercent.name: deviceUsagePercent
deviceUsagePercent.description: Percent of resource in use. When the resource is Disk, it is the amount of disk used by the cache subsytem

deviceUsageHigh.name: deviceUsageHigh
deviceUsageHigh.description: Percent usage which a notification will be sent when the value is reached. For example if deviceUsageHigh is set to 79 then notification will be send when the value changes from less than 79 to 79. The default is defined by the device for a particular resource. When the resource is Disk, it is the amount of disk used by the cache subsytem

deviceUsageTime.name: deviceUsageTime
deviceUsageTime.description: value of 'sysUpTime.0' at last resource reading.

deviceUsageTrap.name: deviceUsageTrap
deviceUsageTrap.description: At notification is sent when the deviceUsagePercent exceeds a threshold.
